title: Shin Atashin'chi
synopsis: Outrageous misadventures of an almost normal family with a housewife, her husband, and their two kids Yuusuke and Mikan. Wacky humor about this weird family's daily life.
voices: ['Watanabe, Kumiko', 'Sakaguchi, Daisuke', 'Orikasa, Fumiko', 'Ogata, Kenichi', 'Numata, Yusuke', 'Tamagawa, Sakiko', 'Otsuka, Mizue', 'Aikawa, Rikako', 'Midorikawa, Hikaru']
staff: [['Ogura, Hirofumi', ['Director']], ['Orikasa, Fumiko', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Sakaguchi, Daisuke', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Watanabe, Kumiko', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
